com.box.androidlib.FileTransfer
Class BoxFileDownload

java.lang.Object
  com.box.androidlib.FileTransfer.BoxFileDownload

public class BoxFileDownload
extends java.lang.Object

Contains logic for downloading a user's file from Box API and reporting errors that may have occurred. You should not call this directly, and instead use Box.download(String, long, File, Long, FileDownloadListener) or com.box.androidlib.BoxSynchronous#download(String, long, File, Long, FileDownloadListener) to download.

Author:
developers@box.net

BoxFileDownload

Method Detail

setListener

public void setListener(FileDownloadListener listener,
                        Handler handler)
Set a download listener which allows you to monitor download progress and see the response status.

Parameters:
listener - A file download listener. You will likely be interested in callbacks FileDownloadListener.onProgress(long) and FileDownloadListener.onComplete(String)
handler - The handler through which FileDownloadListener.onProgress will be invoked.

execute

public DefaultResponseParser execute(long fileId,
                                     java.io.File destinationFile,
                                     java.lang.Long versionId)
                              throws java.io.IOException
Execute a file download.

Parameters:
fileId - The file_id of the file to be downloaded
destinationFile - A java.io.File resource to which the downloaded file will be written. Ensure that this points to a valid file-path that can be written to.
versionId - The version_id of the version of the file to download. Set to null to download the latest version of the file.
Returns:
a response handler
Throws:
java.io.IOException - Can be thrown if there was a connection error, or if destination file could not be written.
